name: Tremors
description:
*This Version is known to have some bugs*

This Game was made for the Game off 2019  game jam  where I created a game within a month and upload the code to Git hub. This game was created by one person so hope you guys enjoy it 

// this is where the git hub link will be 

Story- 

its the Year 2080 you work for a space mining company out mining dead planets for the resources. With this being way further then any planet visited you ,and small team begin the voyage a few days earlier before the rest of the crew s arrives.  You  arrive to find a couple of your guys  are missing. Help this astronaut figure out the mystery of his missing co workers and what this dead planet has hidden. 

How to Play -

Move Foward -W 

Move Back -S 

Mouse to look around and turn

Space - Jump 

Right Click - Aim  

Left Click  - Fire
